text:
In 2020-2021 we have 203 students enrolled in PR. We will award 21 PR badges:
* 3 badges for midterm results
* 10 badges for lab activity
* 3 badges for final exam results
* 3 badges for lecture engagement
* 2 badges for comunity engagement

In 2020-2021 there are 462 students enrolled in RL. We will award 46 RL badges:
* 9 badges for midterm results
* 18 badges for lab activity
* 9 badges for hands-on exam 
* 9 badges for lecture engagement
* 1 community badges for digital engagement on cs.curs.pub.ro

In 2020-2021 we have 625 students enrolled in USO. We will award 61 USO badges:
* 12 badges for midterm results
* 23 badges for lab activity
* 10 badges for final exam results
* 10 badges for lecture engagement
* 5 community badges for digital engagement on cs.curs.pub.ro and Facebook

In 2019-2020 we have 135 students enrolled in PR. We will award 14 PR badges:
* 4 badges for midterm results
* 3 badges for lab activity
* 4 badges for final exam results
* 3 badges for lecture engagement

* 9 badges for hands-on exam
